channel.title: dask on Yuvi Panda
channel.description: Recent content in dask on Yuvi Panda

item.title: Run dask-kubernetes clusters on a cloud from your Laptop
item.description: You can run your Jupyter Notebook locally, and connect easily to a remote dask-kubernetes cluster on a cloud-based Kubernetes Cluster with the help of kubefwd. This notebook will show you an example of how to do so. While this example is a Jupyter Notebook, the code will work any local python medium - REPL, IDE (vscode), or just plain ol’ .py files Latest executable version of this notebook can be found in this repository
